videos.title: Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
videos.description: In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
videos.additional_info:
Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
Technique - Echo print , Lazy Susan , Motion Blur , Speed Ramp , Stationary camera
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Nathan Rodgers
Colorist - Pavel Marko
Original Source - Link

videos.title: Travis Scott - FE!N (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Fe!n" by Travis Scott featuring Playboi Carti was released on March 30, 2024, on Scott's YouTube channel via Vevo and directed by Gabriel Moses. The song itself, part of Scott's album "Utopia," has been praised for its unique composition and contributions from both artists, showcasing a new vocal delivery by Carti and Scott's titular chorus.
videos.additional_info:
Travis Scott - FE!N (2024)
The music video for "Fe!n" by Travis Scott featuring Playboi Carti was released on March 30, 2024, on Scott's YouTube channel via Vevo and directed by Gabriel Moses. The song itself, part of Scott's album "Utopia," has been praised for its unique composition and contributions from both artists, showcasing a new vocal delivery by Carti and Scott's titular chorus.

videos.additional_info:
Childish Gambino - Sweatpants ft. Problem (2014)

videos.title: Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
videos.director: Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
videos.additional_info:
Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
Valentin Petit, the visionary director of Nike's women's football campaign, skillfully captures the essence of the game by featuring a dynamic cast of all-stars and grassroots players in the Women's Euros anthem. His directorial prowess unveils the unparalleled speed, technical finesse, and undeniable quality that define the current landscape of women's football, setting a new standard for equality in the sport.
Technique - Lazy Susan , Locked-on Lazy Susan
Director - Valentin Petit
DOP - Maeva Von Dinh, Paul Guilhaume
Editor - Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
Colorist - Arthur Paux
Original Source - Link

videos.alt_text: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid
videos.title: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.description: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.additional_info:
Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
A mesmerizing music video featuring a chaotic journey initiated by Diplo's spiked chicken nugget, showcasing wild camera angles, unusual characters, and intense visual effects set in a quirky vintage Chinese restaurant. Director Seaman's close collaboration with Francis ensures a deep connection with the song's rhythms and lyrics, bringing to life a vividly demented world that captivates viewers, with or without the influence of LSD.
Technique - Lazy Susan
Director - Parker Seaman
DOP - Franklin Ricart
Editor - Jacob Ehrlich
Colorist - Josh Bohoskey
Original Source - Link
RESTAURANT
INTERIOR
TABLE

videos.title: Nine Inch Nails - Closer (2009)
videos.description: Filmed at the abandoned Linda Vista Community Hospital in Los Angeles, the video gained popularity and contributed to the band's success. Set in a 19th-century mad scientist's laboratory, the video incorporates imagery related to religion, sexuality, animal cruelty, politics, and terror. Fun!

videos.title: Sam Akpro - Death By Entertainment (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Death By Entertainment" by Sam Akpro, directed by Pedro Takahashi, presents the artist and his band as Wall Street-style bankers caught in an endless loop of hard work and intense leisure. The video employs split screens and dynamic camera movements to convey a melancholic yet captivating atmosphere, mirroring the song's themes of repetitive daily life and the blurring lines between day and night due to physical and mental exhaustion.
videos.additional_info:

Director - Pedro Takahashi
DOP - Max Conran

videos.title: Skims - Lab (2024)
videos.description: 2024 advert for Kim Kardashian's Skims shapewear line, which aired during the pre-show coverage of the Academy Awards. The ad features a striking scene of Kim Kardashian observing numerous versions of herself on a series of video monitors, effectively embodying the essence and irony of modern celebrity culture.

videos.title: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.description: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.additional_info:
Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
A mesmerizing music video featuring a chaotic journey initiated by Diplo's spiked chicken nugget, showcasing wild camera angles, unusual characters, and intense visual effects set in a quirky vintage Chinese restaurant. Director Seaman's close collaboration with Francis ensures a deep connection with the song's rhythms and lyrics, bringing to life a vividly demented world that captivates viewers, with or without the influence of LSD.
Technique - Locked-on Lazy Susan
Director - Parker Seaman
DOP - Franklin Ricart
Editor - Jacob Ehrlich
Colorist - Josh Bohoskey
Original Source - Link

INTERIOR

videos.title: Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
videos.director: Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
videos.additional_info:
Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
Valentin Petit, the visionary director of Nike's women's football campaign, skillfully captures the essence of the game by featuring a dynamic cast of all-stars and grassroots players in the Women's Euros anthem. His directorial prowess unveils the unparalleled speed, technical finesse, and undeniable quality that define the current landscape of women's football, setting a new standard for equality in the sport.
Technique - Lazy Susan , Locked-on Lazy Susan
Director - Valentin Petit
DOP - Maeva Von Dinh, Paul Guilhaume
Editor - Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
Colorist - Arthur Paux
Original Source - Link

videos.title: ONHA - KODAK (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Kodak" by ONHA, directed by Nitram, showcases the artist moving through different lively and surreal environments that correspond to playlists on a girl's phone. In one standout scene, ONHA is turned into a basketball, remaining the focal point during a game. The video is praised for its ambitious concept and impressive visual effects, making it a visually captivating experience.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Dua Lipa - Training Season (2024)
videos.description: In the "Training Season" video, Dua Lipa remains composed at a cafe, surrounded by gawking men taking photos of her. The song's inspiration, as shared by Lipa, stemmed from a series of bad dates, leading her to declare the end of her "training season" and shaping the song with songwriters Caroline Ailin and Tobias Jesso Jr.

videos.title: Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
videos.description: In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
videos.additional_info:
Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
Technique - Echo print , Lazy Susan , Motion Blur , Speed Ramp , Stationary camera
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Nathan Rodgers
Colorist - Pavel Marko

videos.title: Face (2021)
videos.additional_info:
Face (2021)
The 2021 trailer for Jessica Helfand's book FACE, directed by Lake Buckley and Dayday, was produced for its release by MIT Press. The production team behind the trailer included Nicolas Thau as the producer, Harry Walters as the production manager, and Charlotte Arnoux handling casting. Mayer Chalom was the director of photography, with Davide Sorasio and Emma Penrose assisting as 1st and 2nd AC respectively.
Technique - Light Void , Stationary camera
Director - dayday, Lake Buckley
DOP - Mayer Chalom
Editor - Mah Ferraz
Colorist - Carlos Flores
Original Source - Link
